com.stormpath.sdk.application

Interface ApplicationAccountStoreMappingOptions<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Options
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApplicationAccountStoreMappingCriteria

    public interface ApplicationAccountStoreMappingOptions<T>
extends Options
    ApplicationAccountStoreMapping-specific options that may be specified when retrieving ApplicationAccountStoreMapping resources.
    Since:
    0.9

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T withAccountStore()
      Ensures that when retrieving an ApplicationAccountStoreMapping, the ApplicationAccountStoreMapping's accountStore is also retrieved in the same request.
      T withApplication()
      Ensures that when retrieving an ApplicationAccountStoreMapping, the ApplicationAccountStoreMapping's application is also retrieved in the same request.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.stormpath.sdk.query.Options

        isEmpty

    • Method Detail

      • withApplication

        T withApplication()
        Ensures that when retrieving an ApplicationAccountStoreMapping, the ApplicationAccountStoreMapping's application is also retrieved in the same request. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.

      • withAccountStore

        T withAccountStore()
        Ensures that when retrieving an ApplicationAccountStoreMapping, the ApplicationAccountStoreMapping's accountStore is also retrieved in the same request. This enhances performance by leveraging a single request to retrieve multiple related resources you know you will use.
        Returns:
        this instance for method chaining.
